text: Gérard Istace (26 July 1935 – 21 March 2022) was a French politician. He was born in Nouzonville, France. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was in the National Assembly from 1981 to 1986 and again from 1988 to 1993. Istace died in Revin, France on 21 March 2022 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Ardennes
title: Gérard Istace
